PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-01662014-02-28,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TC,  APA
ActPilotage Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Atlantic Pilotage Authority Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the ATLANTIC PILOTAGE AUTHORITY REGULATIONS in order to (1) harmonize wording of the Regulations with the wording found in the General Pilotage Regulations; (2) address challenges faced in the recruitment and training of pilots; (3) improve safety through licence requirements and operational changes; and (4) ensure fees collected offset administration and other costs incurred by the Authority for the examination and the issuance of a licence or certificate.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0036 Publication Date: 2014-03-12
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Atlantic Pilotage Authority Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the ATLANTIC PILOTAGE AUTHORITY REGULATIONS in order to (1) harmonize wording of the Regulations with the wording found in the General Pilotage Regulations; (2) address challenges faced in the recruitment and training of pilots; (3) improve safety through licence requirements and operational changes; and (4) ensure fees collected offset administration and other costs incurred by the Authority for the examination and the issuance of a licence or certificate.
